transport.question: I have wheels and you can ride me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 I help you balance.
🏞️ You can ride me in the park.
⚙️ I have pedals.

transport.question: I travel on tracks, carrying many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚏I stop at stations.
🛤️ I follow a fixed path.
🚂 I can be very long.

transport.question: I drive on roads and can take you to school. I usually have yellow color.

hints.text: 🏫 I'm full of children in the morning.
🛑 I have flashing lights when I stop.
🚌 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you to far away places.

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.
💺 I have many seats inside.
✈️ I have wings.

transport.question: I sail on water and can carry lots of cargo or people.

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
⚓ I might have a very big anchor.
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people who need to get to the hospital very quickly.

hints.text: 🚨 I have a loud siren.
➕ I have a cross symbol on me.
🚑 I carry medical equipment.

transport.question: I can fly, but I don't have wings, and I go to space.

hints.text: 🚀 I am very powerful.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🪐 I leave Earth's atmosphere.

transport.question: I am a train that goes underground in a city. I avoid traffic jams.

hints.text: 🚇 I travel in tunnels.
🏙️ I stop at underground stations in a city.
💡 I use electricity to run.

transport.question: I'm a motorcycle with three wheels. I am often used for carrying goods or delivering packages.

hints.text: 📦 I have more stability.
🚚 I'm good for short deliveries.
🛵 I'm like a scooter but with an extra wheel.

transport.question: I am a vehicle designed to explore other planets and send back information to Earth. I roam on mars.

hints.text: 📡 I have special instruments.
⛰️ I explore difficult terrain.
🤖 I'm like a robot on wheels.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I can make you wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
☔ You need an umbrella when I'm falling.
☁️ I come from clouds.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like something soft and woolly.
🌬️ The wind blows me around.
🌧️ I can hold lots of water.

weather.question: I'm a hot ball of fire in the sky. I give you light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear during the day.
🔥 I can be very bright.
🌎 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves to play with me.

weather.question: I spin around very fast and can knock things over. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 Leaves fly when I'm around.
🪁 You can fly a kite when I am blowing.
🌳 Sometimes I can be very strong and dangerous.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I look like an arch in the sky.
☀️ The sun needs to be out for me to appear.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am a storm with a very strong, spinning wind. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.
🏠 I can cause a lot of damage.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky, sometimes like small balls. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard and can hurt if I hit you.
⚾ I can be as big as a golf ball!
💧 I start as water droplets high in the clouds.

weather.question: I am a long period of time with very little rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 The ground gets very dry when I am around.
🔥 Wildfires can start easily during this time.
🌱 Plants and animals can have a hard time.

weather.question: I am a scientist who studies the weather. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I use special instruments to measure the weather.
📡 I can predict the weather using computers.
📺 You might see me on TV.
